boat.name: Sea Jay
boat.full_description:
'Sea Jay' is a Scruffie Marine Stornaway 18, designed by Derek Ellard, Australia and built by Oz Marine in 2003.

Built from a kit in 2003, she is of epoxy ply construction.  She is an 18' boomless lug rigged yawl, ideal as a weekender with two cabin and two cockpit berths.
boat.short_description: 'Sea Jay' is a Stornaway 18' designed by Derek Ellard of Scruffie Boats, Australia and built by Oz Marine in 2003.

for_sales.sales_text:
"Sea Jay", Scruffie Marine Stornaway 18. Epoxy ply construction, built 2003, in current ownership since 2005. 18" lug rigged yawl, weekender, two cabin and two cockpit berths. Cockpit tent included in sale. Now fitted for single handed cruising. 4 HP 4-stroke Suzuki. Recently refurbished break-back braked trailer with new axle suspension assembly.

Excellent condition, dry sailed and garaged throughout most of its life, a well maintained boat, currently stored ashore in Dorset.

Seen at Beale Park Wooden Boat Show for a few years, and much applauded in the wooden boat press (Practical Boat Owner).
